head.title: property-no-unknown
head.description: property-no-unknown Disallow unknown properties. This rule considers properties defined in the CSS Specifications and browser specific…

body:
#property-no-unknown

Disallow unknown properties.

.foo { heigth: 100%; }
/**    ↑
 * These properties */

This rule considers properties defined in the CSS Specifications and browser specific properties to be known.

This rule ignores variables ($sass, @less, --custom-property).

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

.foo {
  colr: blue;
}
.foo {
  -moz-align-self: center;
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

.foo {
  color: green;
}
.foo {
  fill: black;
}
.foo {
  -webkit-align-self: center;
}
.foo {
  align-self: center;
}

#Optional options

#ignoreProperties: ["/regex/", "string"]

Given:

["/^my-/", "custom"]

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

.foo {
  my-property: 10px;
}
.foo {
  my-other-property: 10px;
}
.foo {
  custom: 10px;
}
